mapper.sql: Competition_ID, Competition_Name, Competition_Teacher, Competition_Phone, Competition_StudentID, Competition_AnnexURL, Competition_Status, Competition_CreateTime, Competition_ModifyTime, Competition_StringParamA, Competition_StringParamB, Competition_StringParamC, Competition_StringParamD, Competition_StringParamE, Competition_StringParamF, Competition_StringParamG, Competition_StringParamH, Competition_StringParamI, Competition_StringParamJ, Competition_StringParamK, Competition_IntParamA, Competition_IntParamB, Competition_IntParamC, Competition_IntParamD, Competition_IntParamE, Competition_DateParamA, Competition_DateParamB, Competition_DateParamC, Competition_BigIntParamA, Competition_BigIntParamB, Competition_BigIntParamC, Competition_Type, Competition_BigStringParamA, Competition_BigStringParamB
mapper.update: UPDATE wtb_CompetitionApply SET Competition_Name=#{Name}, Competition_Teacher=#{Teacher}, Competition_Phone=#{Phone}, Competition_StudentID=#{StudentID}, Competition_AnnexURL=#{AnnexURL}, Competition_Status=#{Status}, Competition_ModifyTime=now(), Competition_StringParamA=#{StringParamA}, Competition_StringParamB=#{StringParamB}, Competition_StringParamC=#{StringParamC}, Competition_StringParamD=#{StringParamD}, Competition_StringParamE=#{StringParamE}, Competition_StringParamF=#{StringParamF}, Competition_StringParamG=#{StringParamG}, Competition_StringParamH=#{StringParamH}, Competition_StringParamI=#{StringParamI}, Competition_StringParamJ=#{StringParamJ}, Competition_StringParamK=#{StringParamK}, Competition_IntParamA=#{IntParamA}, Competition_IntParamB=#{IntParamB}, Competition_IntParamC=#{IntParamC}, Competition_IntParamD=#{IntParamD}, Competition_IntParamE=#{IntParamE}, Competition_DateParamA=#{DateParamA}, Competition_DateParamB=#{DateParamB}, Competition_DateParamC=#{DateParamC}, Competition_BigIntParamA=#{BigIntParamA}, Competition_BigIntParamB=#{BigIntParamB}, Competition_BigIntParamC=#{BigIntParamC}, Competition_Type=#{Type}, Competition_BigStringParamA=#{BigStringParamA}, Competition_BigStringParamB=#{BigStringParamB} where Competition_ID = #{ID}
